author: chfast
content: <@425279588009246720> <@403707149043105803> <@275684146658148352> About CREATE3 address scheme. I think it is enough to only hash initcode and leave calldata unhashed. It is very easy to add a commitment to calldata in initcode (e.g. hash and compare whole calldata)

author: chfast
content: This is a spec bug. 3670 does not care about it any more but 5450 does. However `RJUMP` at the end is fine.

author: demiurgos_23
content: hi everyone, can anyone link geth's main EOF branch ? or Besu's ?

author: chfast
content: I believe this is the one https://github.com/ipsilon/go-ethereum/tree/eof-cancun but it seems missing some nonce-bump changes related to a failed CREATE.

author: demiurgos_23
content: I have another question, does anyone know what is the status of this Eip : https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4788 (Beacon state root in EVM) ?

author: _shemnon
content: Right now Besu is at https://github.com/shemnon/besu/tree/mega-eof - I'm working to move that branch into the main repo.
